page.title: 10LORD AND LADY HATHERTON
page.content: Lord and Lady Hatherton have lived in Hutton Henry for seventeen years.His full title is the Right Honourable the Baron Hatherton.He has been a baron for 12 years.His coat of arms is a stag's head and a hunting horn. Underneath is the motto written in medieval french-"One God,one king". This title is hereditary and as he has no sons the next baron will be a cousin living in S. America.Lord Hatherton attends the House of Lords regularly to listen to debates,and if there is a Three Lined Whip. For the Opening of Parliament Lord Hatherton wears a red robe and Lady Hatherton wears a beautiful dress, necklace and tiara.When Lady Hatherton was 17 years old she was presented to King George V.She had to curtsy and then walk backwards out of the room.
